newsitem.title: FRANCE: Block of Synthelabo shares trade.
newsitem.headline: Block of Synthelabo shares trade.

text.p: A block of 670,000 shares in pharmaceuticals company Synthelabo traded at 0900 GMT, representing 1.3 percent of its capital, at a price of 734 francs per share, on Wednesday, traders said.
By 0930, the shares lost 0.27 percent at 737 francs in volume of 675,239 shares while the SBF 120 index gained 1.76 percent.
